Functions and templates for developing Epi-Workbench content.


## Installation

You can install templates from GitHub with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("epi-workbench/ewb")
```

## Template files

The ewb package template files for things like creating coding lessons. The template files are located in `inst/templates`.
